channel.title: Please help only i can connect to my server but nobody else can?
channel.description: please help me when i log in it works but when somebody else logs in it says error connecting to server please help via teamviewer please comment below if you will help ;)

item.title: Please help only i can connect to my server but nobody else can?
item.dc:creator: @ellis123 ellis123
item.description:
@ellis123 wrote:

i have portforwarded when i go to canyouseeme.org it says success and i done that ip thing i dunno why people cant connect

Read full topic
item.source: Please help only i can connect to my server but nobody else can?

item.title: Please help only i can connect to my server but nobody else can?
item.dc:creator: @Tension_Ltd Tension Ltd
item.description:
@Tension_Ltd wrote:

m1lkman:

Nevermind all that. Just google how to portforward. Your going to need a brain and password to your router.

He needs ot know this cause when portfowarded’s , and if eh gave the client away with 127.0.0.1 , they won’t connect so this will be helpful later.

Read full topic
item.source: Please help only i can connect to my server but nobody else can?

item.title: Please help only i can connect to my server but nobody else can?
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“lol2011, post:6, topic:410703”][quote author=Tension Ltd link=topic=511980.msg3715474#msg3715474 date=1313611824]
okay, for you to connect , the ip has to be 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0 and for other ppl to connct the ip has to be the no-ip you made, so make sure the client is connect to you no-ip and upload and they download it and play.
[/quote]It doesn’t have to be the no-ip dns address, it can be his actual IP too…[/quote]

Nevermind all that. Just google how to portforward. Your going to need a brain and password to your router.

Read full topic
item.source: Please help only i can connect to my server but nobody else can?

[quote=“Tension Ltd, post:3, topic:410703”]okay, for you to connect , the ip has to be 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0 and for other ppl to connct the ip has to be the no-ip you made, so make sure the client is connect to you no-ip and upload and they download it and play.[/quote]It doesn’t have to be the no-ip dns address, it can be his actual IP too…

item.source: Please help only i can connect to my server but nobody else can?

item.title: Please help only i can connect to my server but nobody else can?
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

127.0.0.1 and 0.0.0.0 is localhost, that means only you can connect to it. If you let the client connect to your IP and have portforwarded other people can connect to your server.
http://www.whatsmyip.org/

Read full topic
item.source: Please help only i can connect to my server but nobody else can?
